# Contributing to Enterprise GRC Library

Thanks for your interest in contributing! Whether you’re fixing a typo, improving a template, or submitting a new policy — your contributions help make this project better for the GRC community.

---

## How to Contribute

### 1. Fork the Repository
Click "Fork" and create a copy under your GitHub account.

### 2. Clone Your Fork
```bash
git clone https://github.com/your-username/enterprise-grc-library.git

### 3. Make Your Changes

Add new templates or policies to the correct folder (/templates, /checklists, /policies)

Keep formatting clean and use markdown

Add your file to the README table of contents if appropriate

### 4. Submit a Pull Request

Open a PR with a clear title and description of your changes. We’ll review and merge when ready.

Guidelines

Use Markdown for all content

Do not include sensitive or proprietary content

Follow the naming format used in existing files

Keep content clear, accessible, and aligned to GRC best practices

Thanks for helping build the GRC ecosystem!

– Neviar Rawlinson
